summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 11, 2019. It records the official inmate count and includes a roster showing an inmate in the hospital under suicide watch, which is significant given Jeffrey Epstein's death by suicide at this facility on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: The Bureau of Prisons conducted an official inmate count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The count sheet and roster were generated, showing a total inmate population and specific assignments.

events.title: Inmate on Suicide Watch in Hospital
events.description: An inmate roster lists an inmate with the assignment 'HOSP' and the operational category 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', indicating an inmate was in the hospital under suicide watch or observation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is dated August 11, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
An inmate roster shows an inmate in the hospital with an operational category of 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative count sheet from the MCC in New York.
No specific inmate names are listed in the provided text excerpts.
The context strongly suggests this document is related to the post-death administrative procedures following Epstein's suicide.
